message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business or personal interests. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not able to meet your price of $800000. I can do better than my initial offer, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair value for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

I'm still very interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. I can meet you in the middle at $1000000, but I need to make sure that's the best you can do. Can you confirm if $1000000 is the lowest price you're willing to sell for?
